feels.name: Love
feels.quote: It is the east, and Juliet is the sun!

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: O blessed, blessed night. I am afeard, Being in night, all this is but a dream, Too flattering sweet to be substantial.

feels.name: Love
feels.quote: My bounty is as boundless as the sea, My love as deep; the more I give to thee, The more I have, for both are infinite.

feels.name: Sorrow
feels.quote: Parting is such sweet sorrow That I shall say good night till it be morrow.

Places.name: Capulet's Garden
Places.description: A romantic setting where Romeo and Juliet express their love for each other.
